page.title: 13SHOPPING
page.content: There is only one shop in the area. The shop is in Peat Inn and is a General merchants. The shop sells groceries,limited electrical accessories etc. To buy clothes, furniture,luxuries etc. you must travel to Cupar or St. Andrews. Even medical prescriptions have to be filled by travelling to Cupar or St. Andrews. To get larger purchases you must travel to Dundee,Kirkcaldy or Leven. You must travel for nearly everything you buy. So you also need petrol for the travelling. This adds to the cost of purchases made which in turn adds to the cost of living in rural areas.
